Comments
July 5, 2022
Mattlikethepaint
Not quite sure why they bothered with this and an LE who is nearly identical (and equally as boring) but I'm glad to at least have a Pyro with the Marauders keyword.
June 15, 2022
Oathful
After seeing the Flame Construct he comes with, I'm not sold on this Pyro. The X-Men Animated set's Pyro performs much better and more consistently than this one in almost every respect. The only thing this Pyro has over him is the extra click and Flame Construct, but the fact that the Flame Construct only happens when he clears means it takes way to long to stack them up. This guy would need a lot more features revolving around said Flame Constructs to make them worth taking over the free Barrier, destroying blocking terrain AND removing and action token AND healing off doing it. That or they could have given him a Flame marker feature, right now he just feels like a lackluster secondary attacker. Thematic: 6/10, Viability: 5/10, Fun Factor: 4/10, leans towards casual
